message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.IR, cs.CR 

This paper deals with the detection and classification of rumors on microblogs, specifically Twitter. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves the use of machine learning algorithms for classification, which falls under cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). Additionally, the paper deals with data preprocessing and feature engineering, which could fall under cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing). The use of information retrieval techniques to verify the validity of information could also place this paper under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper deals with the propagation of misinformation, which could fall under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
